phones.name: Quantum X1
phones.description: Experience the next leap in mobile technology with the Quantum X1, where unparalleled speed meets a breathtaking display.

phones.name: Nebula Pro
phones.description: Capture the cosmos with the Nebula Pro's revolutionary camera system and immerse yourself in its edge-to-edge starlight screen.

phones.name: Stellar Lite
phones.description: The Stellar Lite packs a universe of features into a sleek, lightweight design, making premium technology accessible to everyone.

phones.name: Galaxy Fold Z5
phones.description: Unfold the future with the Galaxy Fold Z5, where a cinematic tablet experience fits right in your pocket.

phones.name: Pixel 8 Pro
phones.description: With the power of Google AI, the Pixel 8 Pro's camera makes every photo a masterpiece, effortlessly.

phones.name: Nova Spark
phones.description: Ignite your creativity with the Nova Spark, the vibrant and powerful companion for your everyday adventures.
